mapper.select: select noti_no, noti_title, noti_date from( select /*+INDEX_DESC(notice pk_notice) */ rownum rn, noti_no, noti_title, to_char(noti_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') noti_date from notice) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount} order by noti_no desc
select noti_title, noti_content, noti_date from notice where noti_no = #{noti_no}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(noti_no, noti_title, noti_content, noti_date) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{noti_title}, #{noti_content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update notice set noti_title = #{noti_title}, noti_content = #{noti_content}, noti_date = sysdate where noti_no = #{noti_no}
